thread.title: Investors Brace for Puerto Rico’s Debt-Restructuring Plan
thread.title_full: Investors Brace for Puerto Rico’s Debt-Restructuring Plan - WSJ

author: Mike Cherney
title: Investors Brace for Puerto Rico’s Debt-Restructuring Plan
text:
Investors will be watching Puerto Rico this weekend for details of a restructuring plan for its $72 billion debt load, as government officials face a Sunday deadline to deliver a draft of the plan to the governor.
The deadline kicks off what could be a busy week for the struggling island commonwealth, which defaulted on bonds from one of its public agencies earlier this month. Under previous agreements, the Puerto Rico Electric Power...
